Intro.title: PROJECTS
Intro.p1: Each project is a new adventure — a playground where I blend engineering, design, and creativity.
Intro.p2: From web development to object design and visual creation, I explore different ways to bring ideas to life. These projects are a concrete way to learn, grow, and push my limits while nurturing curiosity.
Intro.p3: Here you’ll find what drives me: from a mobile app for selling and customizing decorative skateboards, to handcrafting my own display decks, and photography including drone video.
Intro.p4: Each project reflects my vision: create with meaning, learn by doing, and share unique experiences.

App.title: APPLICATION
App.p1: Built entirely with Flutter, this mobile app offers a simple, aesthetic, and interactive experience for creating and customizing decorative skateboards.
App.p2: Users can create an account, browse my creations, purchase available models, or design their own board by choosing the deck type and the visual they like.
App.p3: It also includes delivery-date selection and direct messaging, enabling personalized contact to follow up or adjust an order.
App.p4: This project blends design, UX and full-stack logic in a mobile environment, leveraging Flutter’s power and flexibility for a smooth and coherent interface.

Skate.title: SKATEBOARD
Skate.p1: Every skateboard I design is first and foremost an artistic piece meant to be displayed and add a unique touch to an interior.
Skate.p2: I craft made-to-measure decorative boards where you can choose deck shape, patterns, and finishes. Some pieces are even cut directly into the wood for full customization and an authentic feel.
Skate.p3: My approach mixes design, visual balance and originality to create objects with a strong identity.
Skate.p4: Their clean aesthetics and custom shapes sit at the crossroads of design and craftsmanship — between decorative object and movement experience.

Photo.title: PHOTO
Photo.p1: I’m passionate about wildlife and portrait photography, with an interest in landscapes, aiming to capture genuine and natural moments.
Photo.p2: Photography helps me keep a trace of past moments, a faithful memory of what I lived or observed.
Photo.p3: Whether a gaze, a light, or a scene from daily life, each image freezes a moment that struck me.
Photo.p4: I divide my work between outdoor shoots exploring nature and wildlife, and portrait sessions highlighting expression and personality.
Photo.p5: I also cover some events as a photographer, discovering new contexts and people while enriching my practice through varied experiences.

Contact.title: CONTACT
